headline: KLINGER VERTICAL TRANSLATION STAGE
specstable:
Manufacturer Klinger
Model UZ160
Description Vertical Translation Stage
Other Information

Travel range: +/- 4.5 mm (9 mm)
Load capacity: 30 Kg
Resolution: 10 µm
Table dimensions: 6.25" x 6"
Optional accessories include incremental encoder for position verification and homing
Pittman DC motor M/n 14204C223 (30.3 V, NEMA 23)
Dynamic Research encoder M/N 77L41B192500S817

Condition Like New
Exterior Dimensions
Width 6.500 in (16.5 cm)
Depth 10.250 in (26.0 cm)
Height 3.250 in (8.3 cm)
Weight 35 lb (16 kg)
